com.group50.service

Interface AdminService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminServiceImpl

    @Transactional(timeout=-1,
               rollbackFor={java.lang.Exception.class,CustomException.class})
public interface AdminService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int checkCode(SmsMessage smsMessage)
      Verify that the verification code entered by the user is correct
      SmsMessage findAdmin(Admin admin)
      Check whether the user exists and send the verification code
      java.lang.String registerAdmin(java.lang.String registerDetail)
      There are two new operations, and if an exception is thrown after adding one in the same transaction, it will be rolled back.
      People searchAdminInfo(int adminId)
      Query the administrator in the current thread and return it to the front end
      java.lang.String updateAdmin(java.lang.String updateDetail)
      Update the administrator's information and check whether the user name, mobile phone number and email address exist

      • registerAdmin

        java.lang.String registerAdmin(java.lang.String registerDetail)
        There are two new operations, and if an exception is thrown after adding one in the same transaction, it will be rolled back. Register the administrator and check whether the user name, mobile phone number and email address exist
        Parameters:
        registerDetail - User registration details
        Returns:
        Registration success Information
